ing: 1 (6 ounce) package cranberry flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This recipe is for those challenged by gelatin salads and is guaranteed not to run off your plate!"
ins: In large mixing bowl, whip cottage cheese and flavored gelatin (right from the box) until smooth. Fold in thawed whipped topping. Cover and chill until serving.
